text: Salernitana Calcio 1919 is a football club which plays in Italy. ==Name== *1919–1922 US Salernitana *1922–1927 SS Salernitanaudax *1927–1945 USF Salernitana *1945–1977 US Salernitana *1977–2005 Salernitana Sport *2005–present Salernitana Calcio 1919 Category:Italian football clubs Category:1919 establishments in Italy Category:Province of Salerno
title: US Salernitana 1919
